blogPost.title: What is the smallest change with the biggest impact in regards to climate? Answer by @KirstenHagon, Senior Humanitarian Policy Analyst. https://t.co/5ev4EH2RPP https://t.co/K87kvpZuad
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 気候に関して、最小の変化で最大の影響を与えるものは何でしょうか？Answer by @KirstenHagon, Senior Humanitarian Policy Analyst. https://t.co/5ev4EH2RPP https://t.co/K87kvpZuad
在气候方面，影响最大的最小变化是什么？回答者：@KirstenHagon，高级人道主义政策分析师。https://t.co/5ev4EH2RPP https://t.co/K87kvpZuad
在氣候方面，影響最大的最小變化是什麼？回答者：@KirstenHagon，高級人道主義政策分析師。https://t.co/5ev4EH2RPP https://t.co/K87kvpZuad

previous.title: What are some myths about telehealth we need to debunk? Answer by Mary Jacobson, Chief Medical Director,  @helloalphamd. https://t.co/AsHNgOSzKC https://t.co/WiUs0XMZYT

localize.full_text: テレヘルスって、どんな神話があるんですか？Answer by Mary Jacobson, Chief Medical Director, @helloalphamd. https://t.co/AsHNgOSzKC https://t.co/WiUs0XMZYT
有哪些关于远程医疗的神话是我们需要揭穿的？回答者：玛丽-雅各布森，首席医疗总监，@helloalphamd. https://t.co/AsHNgOSzKC https://t.co/WiUs0XMZYT
有哪些關於遠程醫療的神話是我們需要揭穿的？回答者：瑪麗-雅各布森，首席醫療總監，@helloalphamd. https://t.co/AsHNgOSzKC https://t.co/WiUs0XMZYT

next.title: How can diversity in leadership change the way we work? Answer by @dojiboy9, Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/jl3NzkrE6u

localize.full_text: リーダーシップの多様性が働き方を変えるには？回答者：@dojiboy9, Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/jl3NzkrE6u
领导层的多样性如何能改变我们的工作方式？回答者：@dojiboy9，联合创始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/jl3NzkrE6u
領導層的多樣性如何能改變我們的工作方式？回答者：@dojiboy9，聯合創始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/jl3NzkrE6u
